about_the_game:
🫧Manage How You Like🫧

You can run your laundry empire either by gaining automated passive income with the machines or by getting your hands dirty and cleaning the clothes of your customers to maximize your earnings. You can hire and manage employees to do your dirty laundry too!

🧽Clean With Detail🧽

You can load dirty clothes in the washer, wash them with the washing program of your choice, dry them to save some time, iron the clean clothes for a final touch and detail clean the clothes that your customers bring in. Chop chop!

🧹Take Care of Your Shop🧹

You need to clean the dirt your customers or wet clothes make and repair the machines that need fixing. You can decorate your laundromat and buy items how you like. You can upgrade your shop to become the biggest laundromat. Maximize your income and make famous people your regular customers.

🛠️Upgrade Your Equipment🛠️

Unlock and buy newer and better equipment to manage your time and maximize your profit. Better machines mean better pay.

BUILD YOUR DREAM LAUNDROMAT

name: Laundry Simulator 2025

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Laundry Simulator 2025 is a chill, ASMR laundry cleaning, and shop management game. Open your own Laundromat, and deal with dirty clothes and customers. Clean and manage your shop, upgrade your equipment to improve your clientele to celebrities. Your laundry empire awaits!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
